traits.name: Goal-Oriented
traits.description: Drives achievement of patient care and research goals.
traits.action: Set and track patient outcome goals using SMM’s progress tracker to showcase ambition.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Enhances mental resilience for high-pressure healthcare settings.
traits.action: Lead a critical patient care task to demonstrate fortitude.

traits.name: Accurate
traits.description: Ensures precision in medical diagnoses and treatments.
traits.action: Double-check patient records to highlight accuracy.

traits.name: Logical Reasoning
traits.description: Aids in diagnosing complex medical conditions.
traits.action: Apply logical reasoning in a patient case study to showcase expertise.

traits.name: Spatially Aware
traits.description: Helps visualize anatomical structures or medical imaging.
traits.action: Interpret medical scans to display spatial skills.

traits.name: Dexterity
traits.description: Improves precision in procedures like suturing.
traits.action: Practice surgical simulations to demonstrate dexterity.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: Boosts stamina for long hospital shifts.
traits.action: Maintain a fitness routine to sustain energy in healthcare roles.

traits.name: Melodic
traits.description: Enhances patient interactions with soothing communication.
traits.action: Use a calming tone in patient consultations to engage effectively.

traits.name: Artistic Sensitivity
traits.description: Improves design of patient education materials.
traits.action: Create visually appealing health infographics to showcase aesthetics.

traits.name: Creativity
traits.action: Propose a new patient care approach in a team meeting.

traits.name: Observational
traits.action: Share patient observations in a clinical discussion to demonstrate skill.

traits.name: Problem-Solving
traits.action: Lead a case study analysis to showcase problem-solving.

traits.name: Decision-Making
traits.action: Make strategic decisions in a medical simulation to demonstrate capability.

traits.name: Strategic Planning
traits.action: Develop a patient care plan to highlight planning skills.

traits.name: Critical Thinking
traits.action: Lead a team discussion on treatment strategies to showcase critical thinking.

traits.name: Communication
traits.action: Deliver a clear patient education session to showcase communication skills.

traits.name: Teamwork
traits.action: Lead a collaborative patient care project to demonstrate teamwork.

traits.name: Leadership
traits.action: Mentor a junior healthcare professional to show leadership.

traits.name: Negotiation
traits.action: Negotiate a mock resource allocation to highlight negotiation skills.

traits.name: Drive
traits.action: Pursue a challenging clinical goal to showcase drive.

traits.name: Growth Mindset
traits.action: Share insights from a medical journal in a team meeting.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.action: Share strategies for managing stress in a clinical setting.

traits.name: Self-Efficacy
traits.action: Present a confident patient diagnosis to demonstrate self-efficacy.

traits.name: Intrinsic Motivation
traits.action: Share personal motivations in a team discussion to inspire others.

traits.name: Adaptability
traits.description: Enables adjustment to new medical protocols.
traits.action: Adapt a treatment plan to new guidelines to show flexibility.

traits.name: Time Management
traits.action: Organize a clinical schedule to demonstrate time management.

traits.name: Proactiveness
traits.action: Propose a new patient care initiative to showcase proactiveness.

traits.name: Data Analysis
traits.action: Analyze patient data to highlight analytical skills.

traits.name: Programming
traits.action: Develop a simple health data script in Python to show technical skills.

traits.name: Numerical Reasoning
traits.action: Solve complex dosage problems to demonstrate reasoning.

traits.name: Technical Troubleshooting
traits.action: Fix a medical device issue to show troubleshooting skills.

traits.name: Scientific Observation
traits.action: Present a clinical observation from a study to highlight skills.

traits.name: Design Thinking
traits.action: Design a patient-centric care approach to showcase design thinking.

traits.name: Emotional Intelligence
traits.action: Build rapport with patients to demonstrate emotional intelligence.

traits.name: Resistance
traits.action: Share stress management tips in a clinical setting.

traits.name: Emotional Expression
traits.action: Express empathy in a patient consultation to build trust.

traits.name: Numerical Aptitude
traits.action: Perform quick calculations in a clinical meeting to show aptitude.

traits.name: Spatial Intelligence
traits.action: Interpret a medical image to demonstrate spatial skills.

traits.name: Analytical Thinking
traits.action: Analyze a patient case to showcase analytical skills.

traits.name: Compassion
traits.action: Show compassion in patient interactions to strengthen relationships.

traits.name: Eclecticism
traits.action: Propose a holistic treatment plan to highlight eclecticism.

traits.name: Inquisitiveness
traits.action: Share a research question in a team discussion to demonstrate curiosity.

traits.name: Precision
traits.action: Perform a precise clinical task to showcase precision.

traits.name: Organization
traits.action: Organize patient data for a project to show organizational skills.

traits.name: Responsibility
traits.action: Take ownership of a clinical task to highlight responsibility.

traits.name: Self-Discipline
traits.action: Maintain a disciplined study schedule for medical certifications.

traits.name: Agility
traits.description: Enables quick responses to medical emergencies.
traits.action: Respond swiftly in a clinical simulation to show agility.

traits.name: Assertiveness
traits.action: Advocate for a patient in a team meeting to demonstrate assertiveness.

traits.name: Talkativeness
traits.action: Engage patients in a health discussion to showcase talkativeness.

traits.name: Empathy
traits.action: Show empathy in patient consultations to build trust.

traits.name: Cooperation
traits.action: Collaborate on a patient care plan to demonstrate cooperation.

traits.name: Coordination
traits.action: Coordinate a clinical team task to show coordination.

traits.name: Frankness
traits.action: Practice transparent communication in patient consultations.

traits.name: Patience
traits.action: Demonstrate patience in a chronic care scenario.

traits.name: Fear Management
traits.description: Reduces anxiety in high-stakes medical situations.
traits.action: Share fear management strategies in a clinical setting.

traits.name: Balance
traits.description: Maintains stability in demanding healthcare roles.
traits.action: Maintain work-life balance to demonstrate stability.

traits.name: Persuasive
traits.action: Deliver a persuasive health recommendation to showcase skills.

traits.name: Storytelling
traits.action: Craft a compelling health narrative for patients.

traits.name: Discerning
traits.action: Evaluate a treatment outcome to show discernment.

traits.name: Innovative
traits.action: Propose a creative medical intervention in a meeting.

traits.name: Conceptual Thinking
traits.action: Explain a medical concept to colleagues to show conceptual skills.

traits.name: Quantitative Skills
traits.action: Build a statistical health model to demonstrate quantitative skills.

traits.name: Methodical
traits.action: Develop a clinical workflow to showcase methodical skills.

traits.name: Analytic
traits.action: Perform a patient data analysis to demonstrate analytic skills.

traits.name: Imaginative
traits.action: Propose an imaginative treatment idea to show creativity.

traits.name: Aesthetic
traits.description: Improves visual appeal of health materials.
traits.action: Design a polished patient education poster to showcase aesthetics.

traits.name: Team-Oriented
traits.action: Lead a team patient care project to demonstrate team orientation.
